name: Eggs, Beans, and Leaves
description:
Play as an Egg with awesome abilities and survive against bean enemies. How long can you roll without dying?

EARLY ACCESS

The game is currently being actively developed. There will be a lot more contents coming soon such as Boss Battles, Enemies, Rooms, Upgrades, Items, and more!

AVAILABLE PLATFORMS

The game is available on Google Play and App Store for free with ads.
By purchasing the PC version, which is ad-free, you will be unlocking...

- 5 Wearables and Skins 
- Free 100 eggs

Moreover, the money will greatly support Awander to keep making games and YouTube videos for you :^)    

CREDITS

Dedicated to Awander's YouTube community, Wanderers! Join us in our exciting game dev adventure!

SOCIAL MEDIA

YouTube - Enjoy Awander's devlogs and behind-the-scenes vlogs
Discord - Meet Wanderers and talk about games (or other stuff)!
